name: @lume/cli
description: A CLI for managing JavaScript/TypeScript packages.

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-workspaces --message 'v%s' && npm publish --no-workspaces && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-workspaces --message 'v%s' && npm publish --no-workspaces && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-workspaces --message 'v%s' && npm publish --no-workspaces && git push --follow-tags
